CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: long wavelength blue - shifted by 40 nm and 108 nm with insertion of one and two thienyl spacers to PDTP-BT , the absorption coefficients at the absorption maxima increase from 3.6 × 10^4 ( PDTP-BT ) to 4.0 × 10^4 ( PDTP - DTBT ) and 4.7 × 10^4 L mol^-1 cm^-1 ( PDTP-DT2BT ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| long wavelength blue |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP - DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

The entities are identified as "Material Name" because they refer to specific materials or substances mentioned in the paragraph. They are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph again, I realize that "long wavelength blue" is not a material name but a description of the light being shifted. Therefore, the revised list of material names is:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP - DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

These are the only clear material names mentioned in the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: long wavelength blue - shifted by 40 nm and 108 nm with insertion of one and two thienyl spacers to PDTP-BT , the absorption coefficients at the absorption maxima increase from 3.6 × 10^4 ( PDTP-BT ) to 4.0 × 10^4 ( PDTP - DTBT ) and 4.7 × 10^4 L mol^-1 cm^-1 ( PDTP-DT2BT ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| long wavelength |
| blue - shifted |
| absorption coefficients |
| absorption maxima |

Note that "40 nm" and "108 nm" are not considered "Property Name" entities because they are measurements, not properties. Similarly, "one" and "two thienyl spacers" are not considered "Property Name" entities because they are specific instances of a spacer, not properties. Finally, "PDTP-BT", "PDTP-DTBT", and "PDTP-DT2BT" are not considered "Property Name" entities because they are specific chemical compounds, not properties.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After removing entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property", we have the following "Property Name" entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption coefficients |
| absorption maxima |

Note that "long wavelength" and "blue - shifted" are not considered "Property Name" entities because they are not properties of the material, but rather describe the wavelength of light. The values "40 nm" and "108 nm" are also not considered "Property Name" entities because they are measurements, not properties.
